Rule_Description: If more than 40% of category spend is concentrated in a single region
Action_Recommendation: Diversify sourcing across 3-4 regions minimum to reduce geographic risk

Rule_Description: If bottom 20% of spend is distributed across too many suppliers
Action_Recommendation: Consolidate tail spend suppliers from 20 to 5 for 10-20% savings

Rule_Description: If more than 60% of category spend is with a single supplier
Action_Recommendation: Qualify 2-3 alternative suppliers to reduce dependency risk

Rule_Description: Contracts expiring within 90 days without renewal plan
Action_Recommendation: Initiate contract renewal negotiations immediately

Rule_Description: Supplier ESG score below minimum acceptable threshold
Action_Recommendation: Engage suppliers on ESG improvement or find alternatives

Rule_Description: Price deviation exceeds acceptable variance from historical average
Action_Recommendation: Investigate price increase and renegotiate if not justified

Rule_Description: Supplier quality rejection rate exceeds acceptable threshold
Action_Recommendation: Implement enhanced quality controls or supplier development

Rule_Description: On-time delivery rate falls below acceptable threshold
Action_Recommendation: Address delivery issues with supplier or qualify backup

Rule_Description: Payment terms shorter than target for cost optimization
Action_Recommendation: Negotiate extended payment terms for working capital improvement

Rule_Description: Supplier debt-to-equity ratio exceeds risk threshold
Action_Recommendation: Monitor financial health closely and qualify backup suppliers

Rule_Description: Supplier capacity utilization approaching maximum
Action_Recommendation: Assess capacity constraints and plan for alternative sources

Rule_Description: MOQ represents excessive months of demand
Action_Recommendation: Negotiate lower MOQ or find alternative suppliers

Rule_Description: Lead time variance exceeds acceptable threshold
Action_Recommendation: Address lead time consistency issues with supplier

Rule_Description: Foreign currency spend exceeds hedging threshold
Action_Recommendation: Implement currency hedging for exposed spend

Rule_Description: Spend with diverse suppliers below target
Action_Recommendation: Increase engagement with minority/women-owned businesses

Rule_Description: Spend with innovative suppliers below target
Action_Recommendation: Identify and engage suppliers with strong R&D capabilities

Rule_Description: Local content below regulatory or policy requirement
Action_Recommendation: Increase local sourcing to meet requirements

Rule_Description: Insufficient number of qualified suppliers for category
Action_Recommendation: Accelerate supplier qualification program

Rule_Description: Price exceeds market benchmark by threshold
Action_Recommendation: Renegotiate pricing or switch to competitive supplier

Rule_Description: Supplier response time exceeds acceptable threshold
Action_Recommendation: Address communication issues with supplier

Rule_Description: Contract compliance rate below acceptable threshold
Action_Recommendation: Address contract compliance issues with supplier

Rule_Description: Inventory turnover below efficient threshold
Action_Recommendation: Optimize inventory levels and supplier delivery frequency

Rule_Description: Herfindahl-Hirschman Index exceeds concentration threshold
Action_Recommendation: Diversify supplier base to reduce concentration risk

Rule_Description: Spend in high-risk geopolitical regions exceeds threshold
Action_Recommendation: Limit exposure and develop alternative sources

Rule_Description: Supplier cybersecurity rating below minimum
Action_Recommendation: Require cybersecurity improvements or limit data sharing

Rule_Description: Percentage of certified suppliers below requirement
Action_Recommendation: Ensure all suppliers maintain required certifications

Rule_Description: Time since last supplier audit exceeds threshold
Action_Recommendation: Schedule supplier audit immediately

Rule_Description: Contract lacks price protection clause
Action_Recommendation: Negotiate price escalation caps in contract renewal

Rule_Description: Critical categories without qualified backup supplier
Action_Recommendation: Qualify at least one backup supplier for critical categories

Rule_Description: Supplier innovation score below target for strategic categories
Action_Recommendation: Engage suppliers on innovation roadmap or find alternatives

Rule_Description: Supplier carbon footprint exceeds sustainability target
Action_Recommendation: Work with supplier on carbon reduction or find greener alternatives

Rule_Description: Suppliers without ethical sourcing certification
Action_Recommendation: Require ethical certifications (SA8000 Fair Trade) from all suppliers

Rule_Description: Number of low-spend suppliers exceeds efficient threshold
Action_Recommendation: Consolidate to 5 preferred suppliers for operational efficiency

Rule_Description: Strategic spend without long-term contract coverage
Action_Recommendation: Negotiate long-term agreements for strategic categories

Rule_Description: Composite supplier performance score below threshold
Action_Recommendation: Implement supplier development program or replace underperformers
